dashboard.label: Executive View - Alternative

Origins"},"viz_single_1":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"majorValue":"> sparklineValues | lastPoint()","trendValue":"> sparklineValues | delta(-2)","sparklineValues":"> primary | seriesByName('clouds')","backgroundColor":"transparent","majorColor":"#0877a6"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_1"},"title":"Cloud Providers Monitored"},"viz_single_2":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"off","trendDisplay":"percent","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","trendInterval":"-24h","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent","majorColor":"#dc4e41","trendColor":"> trendValue | rangeValue(trendColorEditorConfig)"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_2"},"title":"Attack Attempts Identified (Last 24 Hours)","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"to":0,"value":"#1C6B2D"},{"from":0,"value":"#9E2520"}],"trendColorEditorConfig":[{"value":"#1c6b2d","to":0},{"value":"#dc4e41","from":0}]}},"viz_single_3":{"type":"splunk.singlevalue","options":{"colorMode":"block","drilldown":"none","numberPrecision":0,"refresh.display":"progressbar","sparklineDisplay":"below","trendDisplay":"absolute","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","unitPosition":"after","shouldUseThousandSeparators":true,"backgroundColor":"transparent","majorColor":"#0877a6"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_3"},"title":"Cloud Users Protected","context":{"convertedColorRange":[{"from":0,"value":"#006d9c"},{"to":0,"value":"#dc4e41"}]}},"viz_chart_1":{"type":"viz.line","options":{"axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisNone","axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation":0,"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY2.visibility":"visible","axisX.abbreviation":"none","axisX.scale":"linear","axisY.abbreviation":"none","axisY.scale":"linear","axisY2.abbreviation":"none","axisY2.enabled":0,"axisY2.scale":"inherit","chart.bubbleMaximumSize":50,"chart.bubbleMinimumSize":10,"chart.bubbleSizeBy":"area","chart.nullValueMode":"gaps","chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold":0.01,"chart.stackMode":"default","chart.style":"shiny","drilldown":"none","layout.splitSeries":0,"layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":0,"legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisMiddle","legend.mode":"standard","lineWidth":7,"refresh.display":"progressbar","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium","legend.placement":"none","axisTitleY.text":""},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_4"},"title":"User Trend over 30 days"},"viz_chart_2":{"type":"viz.line","options":{"axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisNone","axisLabelsX.majorLabelStyle.rotation":0,"axisTitleX.visibility":"collapsed","axisTitleY.text":"GB","axisTitleY.visibility":"visible","axisTitleY2.visibility":"visible","axisX.abbreviation":"none","axisX.scale":"linear","axisY.abbreviation":"none","axisY.scale":"linear","axisY2.abbreviation":"none","axisY2.enabled":0,"axisY2.scale":"inherit","chart.bubbleMaximumSize":50,"chart.bubbleMinimumSize":10,"chart.bubbleSizeBy":"area","chart.nullValueMode":"gaps","chart.showDataLabels":"none","chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold":0.01,"chart.stackMode":"default","chart.style":"shiny","drilldown":"none","layout.splitSeries":0,"layout.splitSeries.allowIndependentYRanges":0,"legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisMiddle","legend.mode":"standard","legend.placement":"none","lineWidth":7,"refresh.display":"progressbar","trellis.enabled":0,"trellis.scales.shared":1,"trellis.size":"medium"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_search_5"},"title":"Network Traffic Volume Trend over 30 Days"},"viz_p35wl84H":{"type":"viz.img","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://608c827dfea1a150756d1a76"}},"viz_d4p3b5yM":{"type":"viz.img","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://608c82a1fea1a150756d1a77"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats count where `infosec-cloud-indexes` by sourcetype
| lookup cloud_vendor_services sourcetype OUTPUT vendor 
| eval vendor=mvindex(vendor,0) 
| stats values(vendor) as clouds 
| eval value=10 
| eval clouds=mvjoin(clouds, ", "), range="guarded"","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Cloud providers search"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where `infosec-cloud-indexes` IDS_Attacks.severity!=informational earliest=-48h latest=-24h 
| append 
 [| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where `infosec-cloud-indexes` IDS_Attacks.severity!=informational earliest=-24h latest=now] 
| appendcols 
 [| makeresults 
 | eval time=now() 
 ] 
| rename time AS _time","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Attacks"},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) from datamodel=Authentication where `infosec-cloud-indexes`","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-48h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Users"},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(Authentication.user) as users from datamodel=Authentication.Authentication where `infosec-cloud-indexes` earliest=-30d@d latest=-1d@d groupby _time span=1d","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"User trend"},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true sum(All_Traffic.bytes) as volume from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where `infosec-cloud-indexes` earliest=-30d@d latest=-1d@d groupby _time span=1d 
| eval volume=round(volume/1024/1024/1024,2)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-7d@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Traffic trend"},"ds_map":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where `infosec-cloud-indexes` IDS_Attacks.severity!=informational by IDS_Attacks.src 
| rename "IDS_Attacks.*" as "*" 
| iplocation src 
| stats count by Country | geom geo_countries allFeatures=true featureIdField=Country","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"}},"name":"Map"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","showTitleAndDescription":false,"backgroundColor":"#212526","height":750},"structure":[{"item":"viz_map","type":"block","position":{"x":310,"y":120,"w":550,"h":390}},{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":20,"w":400,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":400,"y":20,"w":400,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":800,"y":20,"w":400,"h":100}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":500,"w":580,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_chart_2","type":"block","position":{"x":610,"y":500,"w":580,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_p35wl84H","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":110,"w":330,"h":390}},{"item":"viz_d4p3b5yM","type":"block","position":{"x":860,"y":120,"w":330,"h":390}}],"globalInputs":[]},"description":"","title":"Executive View - Alternative"}
